short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort youtube comments with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds one button right next to subscribe button that says: "sort comments".
On click it will start sorting it on my server and when done it will open sorted comments in beautiful UI on youtube-comments.io. *Can take up to few minutes for videos with a lot of comments(10k+).
